summary.para: Contains values which specify how ASPxTreeList controls are bound to data.
When an ASPxTreeList control is loaded, all the existing nodes are loaded from the database.
Only the nodes that must be displayed in a UI are loaded from the database.
The module contained in the DevExpress.ExpressApp.TreeListEditors.v13.1.dll assembly.
Creates an instance of the TreeListEditorsModuleBase class.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.TreeListEditors.TreeListEditorsModuleBase.GetModuleUpdaters(DevExpress.ExpressApp.IObjectSpace,System.Version)

summary.para: Returns the list of updaters that handle database updates for the TreeListEditorsModuleBase module.

member.param: An object which represents the Object Space used to update the database.
A System.Version object which represents the current database version.
member.returns: An IEnumerable@lt;@gt; list of updaters that handle database updates for the TreeListEditorsModuleBase module.
